DOC.brief_summary: The main objective study evaluate bioequivalence new formulation ibuprofen 400 mg/10 mL oral suspension vs. market reference product MOMENTACT 400 mg film-coated tablet , administer fasting condition single oral dose healthy male female volunteer , two consecutive study period .
DOC.brief_title: Bioequivalence Study Ibuprofen 400 mg/10 mL Oral Suspension vs. MOMENTACT 400 mg Film-coated Tablet
